entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
